text: Si tonitruauerit hora uespertina significat natiuitatem cuiusdam magniGif hit þunrað on tide æfen hit getacnað acennednysse sumes miceles.
Si prima noctis hora significat mortalitatemGif on forman nihte tide hit getacnad cwealm.
Si hora tercia noctis significat iram domini uel iudicium eius in mundoGif on tide þriddan nihte getacnaþ yrre drihten oððe dom his on middanearde.

Si hora quinta medie noctis significat aliquem sonum egredientem de seculo uel undictam in mundoGif on tide þriddan midre nihte hit getacnaþ sumne sweg utgangende of wurulde oððe wrace on middangearde.
Si gallicantu significat bellum & effusionem sanguinisGif on angræde hit getacnaþ gefeoht & gete blodes.
Si hora matutina significat natiuitatem regisGif on tide dægræd hit getacnaþ gebyrdtide cyniniges.
Si hora ortus solis significat gentem aliquam conuenientem ad fidem ChristiGif on tide upganges sunnan <getacnað> þeode sume togædere cumenne to geleafan cristes.

Si hora VI diei significat hereses surgentes in mundo & persecutionem Christianorum a deo permissamGif on tide þære syxtan getacnaþ gydwildu arisende on middanerde & ehtnysse cristenra fram gode geþafod.
Si hora VII tonitruauerit de quacumque parte celi fructum & ubertatem magnam futuram significatGif on tide seofoðan þunrað of gewylcum dæle heofonas wæstm & genihtsumnysse micele towerde getacnaþ.

Si hora VIII tonitruauerit a parte meridiane, significat habundantiam panis & olei & cladem in armentis & quadrupedibusGif on tide þære ehtoþa þunrað fram dæle middæges <getacnað> genihtsumnysse laf & eles & cwyld on heordum & fyþerfetum.

Si hora IX tonitruauerit ab aquilone mutationes gentium & armorum strepidus & nouos concursus populorum significatGif on tide non þunrað fram norðdæle awenducge þeoda & wæpna geruxlu & niwe torynas folca getacnaþ.
Si hora X tonitruauerit ab oriente ruias urbium significatGif on tide þunrað fram eastdæle ryras buruga getacnaþ.
Si hora nouissima diei tempestatem in mari & nuntium belli significatGif on tide æftemystan dæges reohnysse on se & bodung gefeohtes getacnaþ.
Si media nocte tonitruum factum fuerit famem magnam significatGif on midre nihte þunorrad gedon bið ungor micelne getacnað.
